TEXT.TITLE: ITALY CONSUMER PRICES RISE 0.4 PCT IN FEBRUARY
TEXT.BODY: Italy's consumer price index rose 0.4 pct in February compared with January after rising 0.6 pct in January over December, the national statistics institute (Istat) said. The year-on-year rise in February was 4.2 pct down from 4.5 pct in January and compared with 7.6 pct in February 1986. Istat said its consumer prices index for the families of workers and employees (base 1985) was 109.1 in February against 108.7 in January and 104.7 in February 1986. REUTER
